abstract: Off the Rails: The vehicle chosen to replace the Crown Victoria on New York's streets, a spruced-up version of Nissan's NV200, is on display through Sunday.
snippet: Off the Rails: The vehicle chosen to replace the Crown Victoria on New York's streets, a spruced-up version of Nissan's NV200, is on display through Sunday.

headline.main: A Peek at the Taxi of Tomorrow
